channel.title: Unofficial Podcast Feed of Supreme Court of Canada Hearings
channel.description: This podcast feed merely points your podcast player to the webcast audio of hearings that are hosted by the Supreme Court of Canada. This feed uses the "floor" feed, that is, not translated into either English or French, but whatever language happens to have been spoken in the Court. These are all available directly from the Supreme Court of Canada in French and English, and in video, at https://www.scc-csc.ca/case-dossier/info/webcasts-webdiffusions-eng.aspx

item.title: City of Toronto v. Attorney General of Ontario
